Name: Word
Second Dolch: Sentences

Name: always
Second Dolch: I always brush my teeth.^She is always happy.^He always helps me.

Name: around
Second Dolch: We ran around the park.^Look around the room.^The cat walked around the table.

Name: because
Second Dolch: I stayed inside because it rained.^She is happy because she won.^I am tired because I ran fast.

Name: been
Second Dolch: I have been to the zoo.^She has been very kind.^We have been friends for years.

Name: before
Second Dolch: Wash your hands before eating.^I saw him before school.^Think before you speak.

Name: best
Second Dolch: She is my best friend.^I did my best work.^This is the best day ever.

Name: both
Second Dolch: Both cats are white.^I like both apples and oranges.^We both ran fast.

Name: buy
Second Dolch: I will buy a toy.^Can you buy some milk?^He wants to buy a book.

Name: call
Second Dolch: Call your mom.^She will call later.^I need to call him.

Name: cold
Second Dolch: The water is cold.^It is cold outside.^I have a cold.

Name: does
Second Dolch: He does his homework.^Does she like ice cream?^She does help us.

Name: don’t
Second Dolch: Don’t run in the hall.^I don’t know.^They don’t like carrots.

Name: fast
Second Dolch: He runs fast.^The car is fast.^We ate fast.

Name: first
Second Dolch: I came in first.^She was the first to arrive.^This is my first try.

Name: five
Second Dolch: I have five pencils.^She saw five birds.^There are five cookies.

Name: found
Second Dolch: I found my shoes.^He found a coin.^She found a new book.

Name: gave
Second Dolch: She gave me a gift.^He gave his friend a toy.^I gave them a hug.

Name: goes
Second Dolch: He goes to school.^She goes with us.^It goes over the hill.

Name: green
Second Dolch: The tree is green.^I have a green hat.^She drew a green circle.

Name: its
Second Dolch: The cat licked its paw.^The dog wagged its tail.^Its color is red.

Name: made
Second Dolch: She made a cake.^I made a picture.^He made a card for me.

Name: many
Second Dolch: There are many birds.^She has many toys.^I have seen many flowers.

Name: off
Second Dolch: Take off your shoes.^The cat jumped off the table.^He ran off quickly.

Name: or
Second Dolch: Do you want tea or juice?^Is it red or blue?^You can sit here or there.

Name: pull
Second Dolch: Pull the door open.^She will pull the cart.^He pulls the rope.

Name: read
Second Dolch: I can read a book.^She likes to read.^Read this story.

Name: right
Second Dolch: Turn right at the corner.^You are right.^He raised his right hand.

Name: sing
Second Dolch: We sing a song.^She likes to sing.^They sing together.

Name: sit
Second Dolch: Please sit down.^The cat will sit here.^We sit in class.

Name: sleep
Second Dolch: I want to sleep.^The baby is asleep.^He will sleep soon.

Name: tell
Second Dolch: Please tell me.^I will tell a story.^She told him the truth.

Name: their
Second Dolch: Their dog is big.^They washed their hands.^I saw their house.

Name: these
Second Dolch: These are my shoes.^I like these books.^Look at these flowers.

Name: those
Second Dolch: Those are my friends.^I want those toys.^See those birds.

Name: upon
Second Dolch: Once upon a time.^He stepped upon the rock.^She looked upon the sea.

Name: us
Second Dolch: Give us a hand.^They helped us.^Come with us.

Name: use
Second Dolch: Can I use this?^We use pencils to write.^She will use the computer.

Name: very
Second Dolch: She is very kind.^It is very cold.^I am very happy.

Name: wash
Second Dolch: Wash your hands.^I will wash the dishes.^She washes the dog.

Name: which
Second Dolch: Which book do you want?^I don’t know which way to go.^Which color is yours?

Name: why
Second Dolch: Why are you sad?^I don’t know why.^Tell me why you ran.

Name: wish
Second Dolch: I wish for a toy.^He made a wish.^She wishes to play outside.

Name: work
Second Dolch: I will work hard.^He goes to work.^She works at the store.

Name: would
Second Dolch: I would like some juice.^She would help you.^He would go too.

Name: write
Second Dolch: I can write my name.^Please write a letter.^She writes in her notebook.

Name: your
Second Dolch: Is this your hat?^I like your bag.^Your dog is cute.
